database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: PRIDE PXD000076 - Shortgun Proteomic analysis of two Bartonella quintana strains
entry.description: Proteomic analysis two strains of Bartonella quintana using In-solution digestion followed by Stron Cation Exchange (SCX) and RP nano-LC-MS/MS

additional_fields.field: A protein modification that effectively replaces one hydrogen atom with a hydroxyl group.
A protein modification that is produced by reaction with iodoacetamide, usually replacement of a reactive hydrogen with a methylcarboxamido group.
